## ACIC Poster

I'll be presenting my MS thesis work as a recent graduate at the Socity for Causal Inference's American Causal Inference Conference in Detroit, MI in May 2025. Come say hello!


I'll also be presenting at the American Statistical Association Joint Statistical Meeting (JSM) in Nashville, TN in August 2025.
